mapper.select: select a.goods_code goodsCode, a.goods_name goodsName, a.goods_introduce goodsIntroduce, a.inventory Inventory, a.cost_price costPrice, a.now_price nowPrice, a.goods_image goodsImage, a.publisher publisher, a.author author, a.eva_level evaLevel, a.store_name storeName, a.goods_sales goodsSales, a.upload_time uploadTime, a.goods_page_view goodsPageView from t_goods a where a.goods_code = #{goodsCode}

select b.goods_name evaGoodsName, a.cust_code custCode, c.user_acct custAcct, c.user_head custImage, a.eva_content evaContent, a.eva_level evaLevel, a.eva_time evaTime, a.eva_image evaImage from t_goods_eva a left join t_goods b on (a.goods_code = b.goods_code) left join t_sys_user c on (a.cust_code = c.user_code) where a.goods_code = #{goodsCode}
and a.eva_level in (4,5)
and a.eva_level in (2,3)
and a.eva_level = 1
order by a.create_time desc

select a.goods_code goodsCode, a.goods_name goodsName, a.goods_introduce goodsIntroduce, a.inventory Inventory, a.cost_price costPrice, a.now_price nowPrice, a.goods_image goodsImage, a.publisher publisher, a.author author, a.store_name storeName, a.goods_sales goodsSales, a.upload_time uploadTime, a.goods_page_view goodsPageView from t_goods a where a.goods_code = #{goodsCode}
